actionPrompt.editDefault: Add a new object to the current scene. Integrate it naturally with the existing environment and maintain the art style, material, type of art, and quality level consistent with the primary art piece already present
actionPrompt.generateDefault: Replace the main art piece in the scene with a new subject. Maintain the original art style, material, type of art, and overall quality level of the piece being replaced
